snippet: The withering attack against Khaled Meshal comes after Hamas distanced itself from President Bashar al-Assad earlier this year.
abstract: Syrian state television issues attack against Khaled Meshal, leader of the Palestinian militant group Hamas, accusing him of selling out to Israel and trading in resistance for power; attack follows Meshal's appeared at a conference with both Turkish Prime Min Recep Tayyip Erdogan and Egyptian Pres Mohamed Morsi, who oppose Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad, a self-styled champion of Palestine against Israel.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and HANIA MOURTADA

lead_paragraph: The withering attack against Khaled Meshal comes after Hamas distanced itself from President Bashar al-Assad earlier this year.

headline.seo: Syrian State TV Lashes Out at Hamas Leader
headline.main: Syria Berates Hamas Chief, an Old Ally, on State TV
headline.print_headline: Syria Berates Hamas Chief, An Old Ally, On State TV

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
